title.bibl: Dziennik Chicagoski, Jan. 12, 1897. Holy Family Orphanage Receives Material Aid

div.bibl: Dziennik Chicagoski, Jan. 12, 1897. HOLY FAMILY ORPHANAGE RECEIVES MATERIAL AID

body.p: The following contributions have been received from the basket which was placed for public donations at Lazarowicz's Grocery Store, 283 Center Avenue, by the Holy Family Orphanage: 35 pounds of sugar, 4½ pounds of coffee, 2 pounds of rice, 1 pound of raisins, 1 pound of starch, ¼ pound of candy, 1 peck of apples, and 8 bars of soap.
Sincere thanks are expressed to Mr. Lazarowicz, who was the first grocer to deliver the contributions from his basket, and to all other donors.
